query:
SELECT tc.id, tc.taskId, tc.templateId, tc.stage, tc.status, ct.name as templateName
FROM taskChecklists tc
LEFT JOIN checklistTemplates ct ON tc.templateId = ct.id
WHERE tc.taskId = 1;
command:

FROM taskChecklists tc
LEFT JOIN checklistTemplates ct ON tc.templateId = ct.id
